title: VoxGen
description: This is project is a voxel engine made with OpenGL in C++ with procedural world generation. This Project was made as part of my bachelor's thesis.

title: Rubiks Cube
description: This project was made with OpenGL in C++. This is a simple simulation of a Rubiks Cube that can tinkered with a mouse.

title: Storyteller
description: This project is a dungeon crawler game that was made with Unity. I worked in a small team with other developer and artist students. I was responsible for procedurally generating the dungeons.

title: Platform Fighter
description: This project is a platform fighter game prototype that was made with Unity by my friend and me. I was responsible for the movement and moveset programming for which I created a custom "Animation Command" Framework.

title: Morally Flexible
description: This project is a 2 player party game. This game was made in a small during a game jam. I was responsible for implementing gameplay features and directly collaborating with 3d artists from our team.

title: Stripification
description: This project is an implementation of the "Stripification" algorithm where mesh polygons are grouped into strips. This algorithm can improve redndering performance by reducing the amount of draw calls.
